EmailTemplate.subject: We have a new estimated delivery date for case {!Case.CaseNumber}

Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery will arrive shortly
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We are happy to advise that your parcel has received a new scan, and you can now expect your delivery on or before {!Case.EstimatedDelivery__c}
Australia Post delivers more than 2 billion parcels each year, and the vast majority are delivered on time. We're sorry that on this occasion your delivery was later than expected.
Your case will be closed now that your delivery is on the way. You can continue to monitor the tracking for further updates – click here to see delivery options and notification preferences for this parcel.
